Posts.Content: I have just finished Friday last week 20 sessions and 5 boosters oncologist saw me after 5 sessions and advised my breast would definitely peel and blister he said no doubt about it, it will happen frightened me to death, he also prescribed other creams and sprayÂ  which I did not need, even nurse said he was over the top .Now after all the sessions chest is pink some pain but skin is fine no breaks I just used E45 cream three times a day Good luck you will be fine
Posts.Title: Rads - Panic?
